short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fetches HN threads for the current visited page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy to use Hacker News search plugin accessed through an icon in the toolbar. It finds any HN threads related to the current page and displays links to the threads with a minimal UI.
